scripts.build: node scripts/normalize-image-filenames.js && node scripts/generate-image-manifests.js && next build && bun run generate-rss
scripts.normalize-extensions: find out/images -type f -name '*.JPG' -exec bash -c 'echo Converting \"$1\" to lowercase; mv "$1" "${1%.JPG}.jpg"' _ {} \; && echo 'Done normalizing extensions'
scripts.predeploy: bun run build && bun run normalize-extensions && bun run normalize-markdown
